amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, $3,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, for assurance for the Field Programmable Gate Array.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2489 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2489 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12592) To make available, with an offset, $3,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, for assurance for the Field Programmable Gate Array.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2489 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2489 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bingaman.
